query:
query GET_REVIEW_ARTICLE($id: ID!) {
  review(id: $id) {
    id
    title
    blurb
    content
    tracklist
    player
    playerLinks {
      id
      sourceId
      audioService {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    imageUrl
    date
    type
    language
    contentUrl
    author {
      id
      name
      imageUrl
      username
      contributor
      __typename
    }
    labels {
      id
      name
      contentUrl
      live
      __typename
    }
    releaseDate
    genres {
      id
      name
      slug
      __typename
    }
    recommended
    catalogue
    event {
      id
      isFestival
      isTicketed
      venue {
        id
        name
        live
        contentUrl
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    artists {
      id
      name
      isFollowing
      contentUrl
      image
      __typename
    }
    localised {
      id
      contentUrl
      language
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
